data.name: Cannon Jump
data.detailed_description:
"Don't forget to bring your cannon! Shoot down and jump up, it will help you,” said the old pirate. I left the tavern determined to find the mysterious island. Legend has it that countless treasures are kept up there.

In this game, you have to jump and climb up using the classic "rocket jump" technique. But it will not be easy, it will take many attempts, there will be many falls. The map of the old pirate says that unthinkable treasures await you from above.

FEATURES


  • Atmospheric graphics and soundtrack
  • High jumps
  • Long jumps
  • Precise jumps
  • Inaccurate jumps
  • Jumping up
  • Jumping to the side
  • Jumping down
  • Falls
  • Climbing
  • Parkour

- - -

"In shooter games, rocket jumping is the technique of using the knockback of an explosive weapon, most often a rocket launcher, to launch the shooter into the air. The aim of this technique is to reach heights and distances that standard character movement cannot achieve. Although the origin of rocket jumping is unclear, its usage was popularized by Quake."

Wikipedia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64)
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
